doc.title: I reche oslitzata na Valaam
doc.plot: A murder has been committed. The murderer has to face his consciousness... An ass turns away from the path and fetuses to obey. The man 'smites his ass', not heeding about Fate's ominous warnings. And, like ancient Valaam, has to admit how blind he has been... But the murder has been committed. And the verdict does not matter... unless it is a man's own verdict on himself.
